attributes.action: Help Eric Clapton receive a knighthood........
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After an outstanding musical background and contribution to music i believe that Eric Clapton should be Knighted and be rewarded for all he has given to music and also charity, taking in mind that he created his own charity for people who has drink/alcohol problems and also does other charity work which has incleded Teenage Cancer & Prince's trust....... Eric Clapton has been to the edge with his own problems and has battled with them to be where he is now.........

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
